/usr/bin/g++    -Wall -std=gnu++0x   -O0 -Wall -g2 -ggdb   CMakeFiles/echo_server.dir/sylar/examples/echo_server.cc.o  -o /home/xu/Server_SYLAR/sylar/bin/echo_server -rdynamic /home/xu/Server_SYLAR/sylar/lib/libsylar.so -L/Server_SYLAR/sylar/lib -lyaml-cpp -lpthread -Wl,-rpath,/home/xu/Server_SYLAR/sylar/lib
